wikipedia.title: Diabetic ketoacidosis
wikipedia.summary: Diabetic ketoacidosis (DKA) is a potentially life-threatening complication in patients with diabetes mellitus.

wikipedia.title: Diabetes mellitus
wikipedia.summary: Diabetes mellitus (DM), commonly referred to as diabetes, is a group of metabolic diseases in which there are high blood sugar levels over a prolonged period.

blogs.title: PulmCrit- Dominating the acidosis in DKA
blogs.summary:
Management of acidosis in DKA is an ongoing source of confusion.  There isn’t much high-quality evidence, nor will there ever be.  However, a clear understanding of the physiology of DKA can help us treat this rationally and effectively.
EMCrit by Jo
